name: Neon City Endless Runner
description:
Hello Guys!

This is The Neon City Endless Runner. I made it in 2 days using Buildbox. Try to collect all the coins and powerups Like Speed Booster, Magnet & Protection

Booster - Increases the speed of the character for a few seconds

Magnet - Attracts the coin to the Character for a few seconds

Protection - Protects the character from obstacles for a few seconds

Controls

Up Arrow - Jump

Left Arrow - Move Left

Right Arrow - Move Right

Down Arrow - Slide

Visit

Xminal Channel
